attributes.action: stand by and confirm the 18 point deduction on AFC Wimbledon in respect of flagrant breaches of the rules and their wilful disregard of the plights of other teams.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
AFC Wimbledon have been docked 18 points in their league for fielding an ineligble player. AFC Wimbledon are appealing for this points deduction to be overturned.

We feel this goes against natural justice and the reason the rule was put in place. Namely to stop clubs from taking other teams players although there is no suggestion that happened in this case.

We do not see why AFC Wimbledon should be considered a special case. They should accept their punishment.
